name: City Legends: Trapped In Mirror Collector's Edition
name_original: City Legends: Trapped In Mirror Collector's Edition
description:
In this Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure:

Your bestseller about the Order of evil witches has grabbed the attention of a huge publisher. They're ready to cut you a check, but they want to get the draft of your next horror novel as soon as possible. You decide to write about Bloody Mary. And what luck! Pennsylvania Museum has presented a unique exhibit – the mirror of Mary herself. You go there to do research, but the legend turns out to be more than fiction. Try to survive the encounter with a vengeful ghost by solving puzzles and looking for objects hidden in both human and ghostly worlds!

This Collector's Edition includes:

Investigate the disappearance of a young woman and meet mysterious La Llorona in the Bonus Chapter!
Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games!
Find more collectibles and morphing objects!
Get downloadable music and wallpapers!
